11 from coffebot.audio.synthesizer import Talker

14 from coffebot.vision.algorithmia import facial

16 from coffebot import convert

18 import numpy as np

23 logging.basicConfig(filename='desicions.log', format='[%(asctime)s] %(message)s\n\n',
24  level=logging.ERROR)

27 class DecisionMaker:
28  '''
29  Class DecisionMaker. Makes decisions.
30  '''
31 
32  def __init__(self, bot_client_key, yandex_voice_key, algorithmia_api_key):
33 
34  self._bot_client_key = bot_client_key
35  self._yandex_voice_key = yandex_voice_key
36  self._algorithmia_api_key = algorithmia_api_key
37 
38  self.bot = APIAIBot(self._bot_client_key) #create object bot for using api.ai API
39  self.talker = Talker(self._yandex_voice_key) #create object talker for TTS
40  self.sr = SpeechRecognizer(self._yandex_voice_key)
41  self.tracker = SimpleTracker(face_cascade_file='haarcascade_frontalface_default.xml')
42  facial.api_key = self._algorithmia_api_key
43 
44  self._set_topics()
45 
46  self.faces_log = 'faces.log'
47 
48  def _set_topics(self):
49  self._listen_decision = None
50  self._view_decision = None
51 
52  rospy.Subscriber('audio_capture', std_msgs.msg.String, self.callback_listen)
53  rospy.Subscriber('image_capture', std_msgs.msg.String, self.callback_view)
54 
55  def callback_listen(self, data: std_msgs.msg.String) -> None:
56  '''Listening callback function.
57  Args:
58  data: listen data, ROS String type
59  '''
60  print(type(data))
61 
62  raw_audio = base64.b64decode(data.data.encode('utf-8'))
63  wav = convert.raw_audio2wav(raw_audio=raw_audio, pyaudio_config=rospy.get_param('pyaudio'))
64  if wav is not None:
65  print(wav[:10])
66  phrase = self.sr.asr_yandex(wav_data=wav)
67  if phrase is not None and len(phrase) > 0:
68  print('listened: ', phrase)
69  answer = self.bot.request(phrase)
70  if answer is not None:
71  print('answer:', answer)
72  self._listen_decision = dict()
73  self._listen_decision['text'] = answer['text']
74  self._listen_decision['command_info'] = None
75 
76  print('bot answer: ', answer['text'])
77  if 'action' in answer.keys():
78  self._listen_decision['command_info'] = dict()
79  self._listen_decision['command_info']['name'] = answer['action']['name']
80  self._listen_decision['command_info']['parameters'] = answer['action']['parameters']
81 
82  def _all_image_info(self, image: bytes) -> dict:
83  info = dict()
84  info['emotions'] = facial.get_emotions(image)
85  info['celebrities_similarity'] = facial.celebrities_similarity(image)
86  info['gender'] = facial.gender(image)
87  info['age'] = facial.age(image)
88  return info
89 
90  def callback_view(self, data: std_msgs.msg.String):
91  image = convert.str2ndarray(data.data)
92  if image is not None:
93  png_image = convert.ndarray2format(image)
94  if png_image is not None:
95  with open(self.faces_log, 'a') as faces_log_file:
96  face_info = self._all_image_info(png_image)
97  faces_log_file.write(str(face_info) + '\n')
98 
99  faces = self.tracker.find_faces(image)
100  if faces is not None and len(faces) > 0:
101  faces.sort()
102  closest_face = faces[0]
103  self._view_decision = closest_face
104 
105  def make_command(self, command: str, parameters: Dict) -> None:
106 
107  print('command: ', command, 'parameters: ', parameters)
108  try:
109  #split command into parts
110  command_parts = command.split('.')
111  #get command group
112  command_group = command_parts[len(command_parts) - 2]
113  #get command name
114  command_name = command_parts[len(command_parts) - 1]
115  #import command group module from command_modules folder
116  command_module = __import__('command_modules.' + command_group)
117  #call function with command name and parameters as arguments
118  getattr(command_module, command_name)(parameters)
119  except Exception as e:
120  print(str(e))
121 
122  def make_decision(self):
123  if self._listen_decision is not None:
124  say_text = self._listen_decision['text']
125  command_info = self._listen_decision['command_info']
126  if len(say_text) > 0:
127  self.talker.sayyandex(say_text)
128  if command_info is not None:
129  self.make_command(command_info['name'], command_info['parameters'])
130 
131  self._listen_decision = None
132 
133  #if self._view_decision is not None:
134  #self._view_decision.printface()
135  #self._view_decision = None
136 
137 
138 def main():
139  rospy.init_node('decision_maker', anonymous=True)
140  try:
141  decision_maker = DecisionMaker(bot_client_key=rospy.get_param('bot_client_key'),
142  yandex_voice_key=rospy.get_param('yandex_voice_key'),
143  algorithmia_api_key=rospy.get_param('algorithmia_api_key'))
144  except Exception as e:
145  logging.error(str(e))
146  print(str(e))
147  return
148 
149  print('I ready to recieve!')
150  while True:
151  decision_maker.make_decision()
152  time.sleep(0.1)
153 
154 
155 
156 if __name__ == '__main__':
157  main()
